content: React.js is an open-source JavaScript library[3] for building user interfaces or UI components.
Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform, JavaScript runtime environment that executes JavaScript code outside a web browser.
JavaScript is a scripting language used to create and control dynamic website content
TypeScript is a strict syntactical superset of JavaScript and adds optional static typing to the language
SQL is a domain-specific language designed for managing data held in a relational databases
CSS is a language used for describing the presentation of a document written in a markup language like HTML
CSS is a language used for describing the presentation of a document written in a markup language like HTML
HTML is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser
